ðŸ“– Summary: Spill is a transient clipboard server for Windows that allows users to copy and paste data between different machines. It supports both local and remote access via HTTP or HTTPS, and ensures that no data is permanently stored. The application also offers Unicode support and the ability to minimize to the system tray.
